title: Chitarkar
description: A modern web-based drawing application inspired by Excalidraw, featuring a minimal interface for creating hand-drawn like diagrams and sketches with real-time collaboration capabilities. It supports multiple shapes, text elements, and design customization.
features: Freehand drawing and pre-defined shape tools
Custom color palette, font styles, and stroke width options
Support for adding text and annotations
challenges: Implementing smooth and responsive freehand drawing with Canvas API
Managing real-time sync and conflict resolution between multiple users
Optimizing performance for large and complex drawings
Handling different screen resolutions, zoom levels, and canvas scaling
Ensuring consistent drawing state across devices
